actions.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 266 (Roll no. 260).

description: Amendment sought to reform the Environmental Quality Incentives Program to increase access for farmers, and eliminate payments to projects that do not show strong conservation benefits.
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to reform the Environmental Quality Incentives Program to increase access for farmers, and eliminate payments to projects that do not show strong conservation benefits.
